trans-unit.source:
\n

Represents an abstract class that provides properties for objects that do not have properties.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxx xx $xxxxxx$xxxxxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the property.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the property.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the type of component to which this property description binds.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets a value indicating whether this property is read-only.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxx$xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: true if the property is read-only; false if the property is read/write.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxx$xxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxx$xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the type of the property.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Returns whether resetting the component changes the value of the component.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The component to test for reset capability.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source: true if resetting the component changes the value of the component; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Resets the value for this property of the component.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The component with the property value to be reset.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Returns whether the value of this property can persist.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The component with the property that is to be examined for persistence.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xx xx xx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source: true if the value of the property can persist; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x
